sect1.title: General
sect1.para:
Middleware between RL78(SPI) and other diagnose related components on Chorus. The module forwards the request from RL78 to different services that it needs and provides response back to RL78. Similar, if Chorus needs some information from RL78 it can request it using this component. For example this module checks the DiagInfo frame received from RL78, process and forward the data to other components related to:
DTC(s): Process the DTC(s) related data and forwards the requests to set the DTC(s) to DEM. Sends DTC feedback to RL78
CRC32: requests the CRC32 calculation of the RL78 blocks and provides the data further to CRC manager.
Sends the HW version to RL78 and keeps track of the feedback.
SW and FBL version identification.
Temperature and Voltage measurements.
